monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Aerial Strike
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Aerial Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick & Might (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Assault Mastery
skills.description: This monster can receive an additional Stack of Might, Sorcery and Glory. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Brawler
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Might (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Attack value.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Cleansing Flame
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (fire) Removes 1 Buff from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) magical damage (fire) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Fire Affinity
skills.description: Fire attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Fire Breath
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Removes 1 Buff from targets - Applies a random Buff to whole party

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fireclaws
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Forge
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (500 + 80% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Forge Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 100% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Full Aerial Assault
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heat Shimmer
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Improved Assault
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 3% increased damage for each Might, Sorcery and Glory Buff on them.

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Lifechannel
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.description: Critical Hits regenerate 7 Mana.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Sorcerer
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Sorcery (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Magic value.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Crystal Shard
drops.description: Teleports you back to the Keepers' Stronghold
